column4: omg i gonna pull my hair out...:) not really but someone come on....i moved my usb wifi adapter firmware to another location...'sudo mv /lib/firmware/rt* ~/test'
i power off ubuntu and turn it back
my wifi adapter is still working
im trying to find out which firmware my adapter is using
i just see the regular modules
yea...because the firmware stays in memory once its loaded
you can also exercise with lsof and ps
